column6:
Deep beneath the Pentagon the O*N*E is experimenting on the captured Inhumans with horrifying results. On Attilan, while pressure builds for all-out war on humankind, Quicksilver's young daughter Luna uses her developing powers of empathy to probe the dark corners inside the mind of Black Bolt's brother, Maximus the Mad. ,2007,2
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:David Hine | penciller:Frazer Irving | penciller (cover):John Watson
